description: The ship has been surveying energy drilling prospects in disputed waters, sparking a diplomatic row.
title: Turkish ship at centre of row with Greece returns to coast
title_page: Turkish ship at centre of row with Greece returns to coast - BBC News
maintext: Ratcheting pressure up further on Saturday, Mr Mitsotakis announced Greece was "reinforcing its armed forces" and would buy 18 French Rafale fighter jets, four frigates and four navy helicopters. He said the Greek military would increase by troop numbers by 15,000 over the next five years.
